Product Information World-renowned knife brand Global brings you the Global Sai Cook's Knife 25cm, made of CroMoVa 18 stainless steel , featuring a stainless steel handle with thumb rest. This Cook's Knife is versatile, able to accomplish all chopping, slicing, dicing, mincing tasks with ease. The very best quality in kitchen knives, this Global Cook's Knife is a lifetime investment, covered by a lifetime warranty! Key Features: Made of CroMoVa 18 stainless steel Stainless steel handle with thumb rest Lifetime warranty Item not available for international shipping.
